content_excerpt:
Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
External Booking Details
1 message
BoxOffice <boxoffice@brightonfringe.org>
22 April 2025 at 15:55
To: Half a camel production <halfacamelproductions@gmail.com>
Hi Ben,
Could you let me know the details of the bookers who have booked with the venue for 'Crazy Stupid Funny'? They will need to re-book a
ticket through the website once the ticket type has been changed to avoid any risk of the event being over-sold, so I just want to ensure
space is held back for them to do this so that they don't miss out. I'm happy to get in contact with them directly if you are able to pass on their
details.
Many thanks,
Elin Eaton (she/her)
Box Office Manager
A: Office 4 at The Old Court House, 118 Church Street, Brighton, BN1 1UD 
P: 01273 91 72 72 
W: www.brightonfringe.org 
#BrightonFringe #BF20
